Key Match Events: Mexico scored a well-worked opener in the fifth minute through Orbelin Pineda
Mexico found a second goal in the 53rd minute through Cesar Huerta before Luis Romo sealed the result four minutes later
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand now travel to Cincinnati when they will take on the United States on Wednesday
It was the All Whites’ seventh loss to Mexico in as many matches since 2000
Miscellaneous Highlights: The All Whites have been outclassed by an impressive Mexico side in an international friendly at the Rose Bowl in California
Darren Bazeley’s side were no match for El Tri on a sweltering evening in Pasadena
Others: Chris Wood failed to manufacture any clear chances, their best opportunity coming when Tommy Smith couldn’t quite get his head to a corner that had been flicked on
